headline: Intel’s New Board Members Offer Clues About CEO Search
summary: Amid its search for a CEO to succeed Pat Gelsinger, the  Intel  board beefed up its engineering expertise with two new independent directors on Thursday.  Eric Meurice was the CEO of semiconductor equipment manufacturer ASML from 2004 to 2013.  Steve Sanghi is the interim CEO and chairman of  Microchip Technologies  a manufacturer of a variety of low-end chips.

raw.headline: Intel’s New Board Members Offer Clues About CEO Search

Eric Meurice was the CEO of semiconductor equipment manufacturer ASML from 2004 to 2013.  Steve Sanghi is the interim CEO and chairman of  Microchip Technologies  a manufacturer of a variety of low-end chips.

headline: Wafer fab equipment market to decline in 2025 - Morgan Stanley
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley expects the wafer fab equipment (WFE) market to decline 6% year-over-year in 2025 as the industry navigates a transitional period marked by capacity digestion and uneven demand across semiconductor market.

headline: Why Intel Stock Was Sliding Again Today
summary: Shares of Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) continued to retreat today after an initial pop following the exit of CEO Pat Gelsinger.  Intel added new members to its board this morning, but a picture of a chaotic search for a new CEO is emerging as well.  Did Intel make a mistake?

headline: Intel names two chip industry veterans to its board amid CEO search
summary: Intel on Thursday named two chip industry veterans to its board, as the struggling semiconductor firm looks for a new top boss following the recent ouster of Pat Gelsinger and tries to reclaim its lost glory.  The chipmaker said Eric Meurice, former CEO of chipmaking equipment provider ASML, and Steve Sanghi, interim CEO of Microchip Technology, are the new additions to its board.

raw.headline: Intel names two chip industry veterans to its board amid CEO search
raw.summary: Intel on Thursday named two chip industry veterans to its board, as the struggling semiconductor firm looks for a new top boss following the recent ouster of Pat Gelsinger and tries to reclaim its lost glory.  The chipmaker said Eric Meurice, former CEO of chipmaking equipment provider ASML, and Steve Sanghi, interim CEO of Microchip Technology, are the new additions to its board.

headline: Intel adds former ASML exec, Microchip interim chief to board amid CEO search
summary: Investing.com -- Intel Corporation (NASDAQ:INTC) on Thursday said it was adding former ASML (AS:ASML) chief Eric Meurice and Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP)'s interim CEO Steve Sanghi to its board of directors, effective immediately. Both will serve as independent directors.

headline: What Pat Gelsinger's Retirement Likely Means for Intel Stock
summary: Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) is set to begin a new phase of its history amid the sudden retirement of CEO Pat Gelsinger.  Gelsinger spent most of his career at Intel.  With his past experience, the company's board hoped Gelsinger's return would help restore its former glory.
